translation: Just as the one sun illuminates the entire world, so too does the Lord of the field (Supreme Self) illuminate the entire field, O Arjuna.
commentary: 13.34 as as? illuminates illumines? One one? the whole the whole? Lokam world? Imm this? Ravi: sun? the field the field? Kshetri the Lord of the field (Paramatma)? And so? the whole the whole? illuminates illumines? Bharata O descendant of Bharata (Arjuna).Commentary The Supreme Self is one. Does it illuminate the whole matter from the Unmanifested down to the blade of grass or a lump of clay? from the great
